text: Jimmy DeGrasso (born March 16, 1963) is an American heavy metal drummer. He has played with many bands. == Bands == * Mama's Boys: 1985–1986 * Y&T;: 1987–1991, 1995–1997 * White Lion: 1991 * Fiona: 1992 * Suicidal Tendencies: 1992–1995 * Alice Cooper: 1994–1998, 2008–2010 * Megadeth: 1998–2002 * O'2L: 2006 * David Lee Roth: 2006 * Ministry: 2008 * Dokken: 2012–2013 * Ratt: 2014, 2016–2018 * Black Star Riders: 2012–2017 == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:Megadeth members Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania Category:People from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
title: Jimmy DeGrasso
